// <auto-generated/>

#nullable enable annotations
#nullable disable warnings

// Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in generated code.
#pragma warning disable CS0612, CS0618

namespace NServiceBus
{
    public static partial class BasicHandlersHandlerRegistryExtensions
    {
        public sealed partial class BasicHandlersRootRegistry
        {
            public sealed partial class OrdersRegistry
            {
                public sealed partial class BillingRegistry
                {
                    partial void AddAllHandlersCore()
                    {
                        AddInvoiceCreatedHandler();
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers the <see cref="global::Orders.Billing.InvoiceCreatedHandler"/> handler with the endpoint configuration.
                    /// </summary>
                    public void AddInvoiceCreatedHandler()
                    {
                        var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                        var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                        var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Billing.InvoiceCreatedHandler, global::Evt1>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Evt1), []);
                    }
                }
                public sealed partial class ShippingRegistry
                {
                    partial void AddAllHandlersCore()
                    {
                        AddOrderShippedHandler();
                        AddShipmentDelayedHandler();
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers the <see cref="global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippedHandler"/> handler with the endpoint configuration.
                    /// </summary>
                    public void AddOrderShippedHandler()
                    {
                        var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                        var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                        var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippedHandler, global::Cmd1>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Cmd1), [typeof(global::CmdBase)]);
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers the <see cref="global::Orders.Shipping.ShipmentDelayedHandler"/> handler with the endpoint configuration.
                    /// </summary>
                    public void AddShipmentDelayedHandler()
                    {
                        var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                        var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                        var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Shipping.ShipmentDelayedHandler, global::Cmd2>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Cmd2), []);
                    }
                }
            }
            public sealed partial class PaymentsRegistry
            {
                partial void AddAllHandlersCore()
                {
                    AddPaymentCapturedHandler();
                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers the <see cref="global::Payments.PaymentCapturedHandler"/> handler with the endpoint configuration.
                /// </summary>
                public void AddPaymentCapturedHandler()
                {
                    var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                    var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                    var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                    messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Payments.PaymentCapturedHandler, global::Cmd1>();
                    messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Cmd1), [typeof(global::CmdBase)]);
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

namespace NServiceBus
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Provides access to handler and saga registries discovered in the <i>BasicHandlers</i> assembly.
    /// </summary>
    [global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("NService.Core.Analyzer.Tests", "1.0.0")]
    public static partial class BasicHandlersHandlerRegistryExtensions
    {
        extension (global::NServiceBus.HandlerRegistry registry)
        {
            /// <summary>
            /// Gets the root registry for handler and saga types in the <i>BasicHandlers</i> assembly.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Use the returned registry to access namespace-specific registries and add-all methods for this assembly.
            /// </remarks>
            public BasicHandlersRootRegistry BasicHandlersAssembly => new(registry.Configuration);
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Root registry to add handlers and sagas for the entire assembly.
        /// </summary>
        public sealed partial class BasicHandlersRootRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
        {
            readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

            /// <summary>
            /// Gets the registry for the <i>Orders</i> namespace segment under this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public OrdersRegistry Orders => new(_configuration);

            /// <summary>
            /// Gets the registry for the <i>Payments</i> namespace segment under this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public PaymentsRegistry Payments => new(_configuration);

            /// <summary>
            /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Orders"/>, <see cref="Payments"/>.
            /// </remarks>
            public void AddAll()
            {
                AddAllHandlers();
                AddAllSagas();
            }

            /// <summary>
            /// Registers all handlers for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Orders"/>, <see cref="Payments"/>.
            /// </remarks>
            public void AddAllHandlers()
            {
                AddAllHandlersCore();
                Orders.AddAllHandlers();
                Payments.AddAllHandlers();
            }

            /// <summary>
            /// Registers all sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Orders"/>, <see cref="Payments"/>.
            /// </remarks>
            public void AddAllSagas()
            {
                AddAllSagasCore();
                Orders.AddAllSagas();
                Payments.AddAllSagas();
            }

            partial void AddAllHandlersCore();
            partial void AddAllSagasCore();

            /// <summary>
            /// Registry for the <i>Orders</i> namespace segment. Use this registry to add handlers and sagas for this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public sealed partial class OrdersRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
            {
                readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

                /// <summary>
                /// Gets the registry for the <i>Billing</i> namespace segment under this branch.

                public BillingRegistry Billing => new(_configuration);

                /// <summary>
                /// Gets the registry for the <i>Shipping</i> namespace segment under this branch.
                /// </summary>

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.

                    AddAllSagas();

                /// </summary>

                /// </remarks>

                    AddAllSagasCore();
                    Billing.AddAllSagas();
                    Shipping.AddAllSagas();

                partial void AddAllSagasCore();
